social_dl.name: social_dl
social_dl.description: Download content from social media platforms
social_dl.author: Komihub

info.name: info
info.description: Get information about user or chat
info.author: Komihub

unsend.name: unsend
unsend.description: Delete bot messages by replying to them
unsend.usage: /unsend - Reply to any bot message to delete it
unsend.author: Komihub

add_command.name: add_command
add_command.description: Add a new command by uploading a Python file
add_command.author: Komihub

kick.name: kick
kick.description: Kick a user from the chat
kick.author: Komihub

yt_music.name: yt_music
yt_music.usage:
/yt_music search query - Search for music
/yt_music YouTube URL - Download audio from URL
/song SongName - Quick search and select from results
yt_music.author: Komihub

update.name: update
update.description: Check for updates and manage auto-updates
update.usage:
/update check - Check for available updates
/update update - Perform manual update
/update status - Show current version status
update.author: Komihub

upload_limit.name: upload_limit
upload_limit.description: Check Telegram upload limits and file size restrictions
upload_limit.author: Komihub

fbc.name: fbc
fbc.description: Generate Facebook cover photo with profile image and contact info
fbc.usage: /fbc John Doe john@email.com +1234567890 - Reply to an image to create Facebook cover
fbc.author: Komihub
